Articles.Content:
So I've been doing Scott Manley's runway project since Season 1, Round 5. It's a BDA competition, but the twist is that half of your points come from art. These are all of my submissions from seasons 2 and 3, season 1 is lost to time, it seems.
 


Some are better than others, but take a look at the timestamps and descriptions for the ones really worth watching.

I can also link this, as I made it, and it's the first video uploaded onto Scott's channel that wasn't made by himself or his daughter. It also explains what RWP is in a nutshell.

I got to make it because of my work in Runway Project, and along with that, I now make his intro and outro, so that's cool lol

Edited November 7, 2021 by Concodroid
